scripts.android:dev: npm run pull-dev-eas-env && npm run android:prebuild && npx expo run:android
scripts.ios:dev: npm run pull-dev-eas-env && npm run ios:prebuild && npx expo run:ios
scripts.android:uat: npm run pull-uat-eas-env && npm run android:prebuild && npx expo run:android
scripts.ios:uat: npm run pull-uat-eas-env && npm run ios:prebuild && npx expo run:ios
scripts.android:prod-beta: npm run pull-prod-eas-env && npm run android:prebuild && npx expo run:android
scripts.ios:prod-beta: npm run pull-prod-eas-env && npm run ios:prebuild && npx expo run:ios
scripts.android:prod: npm run pull-prod-eas-env && npm run android:prebuild && npx expo run:android
scripts.ios:prod: npm run pull-prod-eas-env && npm run ios:prebuild && npx expo run:ios
scripts.eas-update-ios:dev: eas update --environment development && eas deploy --platform ios --profile dev
scripts.eas-update-android:dev: eas update --environment development && eas deploy --platform android --profile dev
